text: Armando de Miranda (1904–1975) was a Portuguese film director, screenwriter, editor and producer.Vieira p.12 He directed twenty six films, including a number of documentaries. He directed the 1945 historical adventure film José do Telhado and its 1949 sequel The Return of José do Telhado. ==Selected filmography== * José do Telhado (1945) * Black Capes (1947) * The Return of José do Telhado (1949) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Vieira, Patricia. Portuguese Film, 1930-1960,: The Staging of the New State Regime. A&C; Black, 2013. ==External links== * Category:1904 births Category:1975 deaths Category:Portuguese film directors Category:Portuguese film producers Category:Portuguese screenwriters Category:Male screenwriters Category:Portuguese male writers Category:Portuguese film editors Category:20th-century screenwriters
title: Armando de Miranda
